pr_title: Add support for YouTube Music search

commits_in_main.message: refactor: create extractors and linkHandler packages for SoundCloud, move YoutubeParsingHelper to youtube package (not linkhandler anymore)
getSearchSuggestion now returns the corrected query if isCorrectedSearch() is true
Throw IllegalArgumentException when Page is invalid
Support YouTube's new continuations for search
Extract stream and search meta info for YouTube
Reduce number of type conversions in YouTubeSearchExtractor.collectStreamsFrom by introducing new variable
Use the youtubei API for YouTube channels
Use the youtubei API for YouTube searches + update mocks
Adress reviews and do some improvements
Fix localization and update client version
Don't use the youtubei.googleapis.com but the websites domains + update client version of the desktop internal API
Use the youtubei API for YouTube mixes + update the corresponding test + do some improvements
Rebase + some code improvements + fix extraction of age-restricted videos + update clients version
Add @ null annotations where Android Studio suggested it
[YouTube] Reduce InnerTube response sizes by adding the prettyPrint parameter with the false value
Fix missing imports and Checkstyle issues
[YouTube] Send Content-Type header in all POST requests

timeline.body: Testing for the items are missing in this test, a simple check with the default tests from `DefaultTests` already show that one field was forgotten to be extracted (the uploader url).
timeline.bodyText: Testing for the items are missing in this test, a simple check with the default tests from DefaultTests already show that one field was forgotten to be extracted (the uploader url).
timeline.bodyHTML: Testing for the items are missing in this test, a simple check with the default tests from DefaultTests already show that one field was forgotten to be extracted (the uploader url).
timeline.author: mauriciocolli

replies.bodyText: True, however we appear to not use the DefaultTests at all for the SearchExtractor. Also, videos have no uploader url, though songs do.
replies.author: wb9688

changed_code.header:
diff --git a/extractor/src/test/java/org/schabi/newpipe/extractor/services/youtube/search/YoutubeSearchExtractorMusicTest.java b/extractor/src/test/java/org/schabi/newpipe/extractor/services/youtube/search/YoutubeSearchExtractorMusicTest.java
deleted file mode 100644
index fe174380..00000000
--- a/extractor/src/test/java/org/schabi/newpipe/extractor/services/youtube/search/YoutubeSearchExtractorMusicTest.java
+++ /dev/null

timeline.body:
As discussed, the default http client from java [has some restrictions about request headers](https://hg.openjdk.java.net/jdk8/jdk8/jdk/file/687fd7c7986d/src/share/classes/sun/net/www/protocol/http/HttpURLConnection.java#l194).

I think using another client for tests is the right choice (like you did earlier, OkHttp is a good one).

Should we do it in its own pull request? The front end is already using it, don't think too many problems would be a result of this, but then we can test thoroughly what kind of effects it will have.
timeline.bodyText:
As discussed, the default http client from java has some restrictions about request headers.
I think using another client for tests is the right choice (like you did earlier, OkHttp is a good one).
Should we do it in its own pull request? The front end is already using it, don't think too many problems would be a result of this, but then we can test thoroughly what kind of effects it will have.
timeline.bodyHTML:
As discussed, the default http client from java has some restrictions about request headers.

I think using another client for tests is the right choice (like you did earlier, OkHttp is a good one).

Should we do it in its own pull request? The front end is already using it, don't think too many problems would be a result of this, but then we can test thoroughly what kind of effects it will have.
timeline.author: mauriciocolli

replies.bodyText: This should indeed be a different PR. I think OkHttp should be used, so we have the exact same behavior in the tests as in NewPipe.
replies.author: wb9688

timeline.bodyHTML:
This could use the InfoItemsPage#emptyPage method, and to improve readability, add brackets and place the return in the next line.

Suggested change
if (ajaxJson.getObject("continuationContents") == null) return new InfoItemsPage<>(collector, null);
if (ajaxJson.getObject("continuationContents") == null) {
return InfoItemsPage.emptyPage();
}
timeline.author: mauriciocolli

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (contentFilters.size() > 0 && contentFilters.get(0).startsWith("music_")) return true;
return false;
return contentFilters.size() > 0 && contentFilters.get(0).startsWith("music_");

timeline.body:
It is available in some video items which have the "Go to artist" button in the item menu, though it is usually for the "topic" channel instead, maybe we should ignore them anyway?

We don't even use this uploader url for anything right now.

timeline.message: Add support for YouTube Music search
Add tests for YouTube Music search
Add Referer header so that it also works with HttpsUrlConnection
Improve code for YouTube Music search
Use new way of specifying stream count
Fix issue when there is no didYouMeanRenderer in itemSectionRenderer
Extract uploader url from certain YouTube Music videos
Move YouTube Music search to its own class
Fix error when YT Music videos has no uploader URL
Add tests for other YT Music search types
